DEVICE_WYAPP_SERIAL_SERIAL_PORT_LOAD_ERR.message: Unable to load SerialPort WyApp Transport, serial devices over wyapp will not be available (error: {{error}})
DEVICE_WYAPP_SERIAL_SERIAL_PORT_LOAD_ERR.description: The error message shown when the serial port library has an error while being loaded

DEVICE_WYAPP_SERIAL_LIST_PORTS_ERROR.message: Unable to list the serial ports (error: {error})
DEVICE_WYAPP_SERIAL_LIST_PORTS_ERROR.description: The error message shown when there is an werror while listing the serial ports

DEVICE_SERIAL_PORT.description: Input text area for the port number of a serial device

DEVICE_SERIAL_BAUDRATE.description: Input text area for the baud rate of a serial device
